amendment.description: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 118-428 to allow the Environmental Protection Agency and states with delegated authority under the Clean Water Act to issue National Pollutant Discharge Elimination System (NPDES) permits for public works (e.g., wastewater treatment or water recycling/reuse plants owned/operated by local governments) for up to 10 years from the current maximum of 5-year permit terms.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A002) Agreed to by voice vote.
